original_text: And Moses stretched forth his rod toward heaven: and the Lord sent thunder and hail, and the fire ran along upon the ground; and the Lord rained hail upon the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 모세가 하늘을 향하여 지팡이를 들매 여호와께서 우렛소리와 우박을 보내시고 불을 내려 땅에 달리게 하시니라 여호와께서 우박을 애굽 땅에 내리시매

sentences.original_text: And Moses stretched forth his rod toward heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 하늘을 향해 그의 지팡이를 뻗었고

sentences.original_text: and the Lord sent thunder and hail
and the fire ran along upon the ground
and the Lord rained hail upon the land of Egypt
